_env_config._note: Environment variables used by hooks. Set in shell or .envrc to customize behavior.
_env_config.ALLOW_DIRECT_PYTHON: Set to 1 to bypass enforce-uv-run check
_env_config.ALLOW_DIRECT_COMMANDS: Set to 1 to bypass enforce-make-commands check
_env_config.CLAUDE_SKIP_PLAN_COPY: Set to 1 to disable plan copying
_env_config.CLAUDE_TRACK_USAGE: Enable usage tracking (default: 1, set to 0 to disable)
_env_config.ALLOW_DANGEROUS_COMMANDS: Set to 1 to bypass block-dangerous-commands check
_env_config.ALLOW_ENV_READ: Set to 1 to allow reading .env files
_env_config.ALLOW_JSON_READ: Set to 1 to allow raw JSON file reads (bypass /read-json suggestion)
_env_config.JSON_READ_WARN: Set to 1 to warn instead of block for JSON files
_env_config.JSON_SIZE_THRESHOLD_KB: Size threshold in KB for JSON blocking (default: 50)
_env_config.ALLOW_JSON_PATTERNS: Comma-separated JSON filenames to allow (default: package.json,tsconfig.json,...)
_env_config.ALLOW_COMMIT_ON_MAIN: Set to 1 to allow git commit on protected branches
